title: 4. Get array of Meta informations
name: GetMeta

permission.name: TokenAccess
permission.title: The Client must have a token that allows it to get access on this resource.

description: Group of meta informations used to define each dynamic entity.

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content: https://localhost/api/de/meta

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
  {
    "field": "Driver",
    "type": "ENTITY",
    "unique": [],
    "defaultReference": "full_name",
    "structureList": [
      {
        "field": "Full Name",
        "type": "TEXT",
        "description": "Any description here",
        "allowNull": false,
        "identifier": "full_name",
        "name": "full_name"
      },
      {
        "field": "Age",
        "type": "INTEGER",
        "description": "Any description here",
        "allowNull": false,
        "identifier": "age",
        "name": "age"
      }
    ],
    "identifier": "driver"
  },
  {
    "field": "Car",
    "type": "ENTITY",
    "unique": [
      [
        "rfid_code"
      ]
    ],
    "defaultReference": "plate",
    "structureList": [
      {
        "field": "RFID Code",
        "type": "RFIDCODE",
        "description": "Any description here",
        "allowNull": false,
        "identifier": "rfid_code",
        "name": "rfid_code"
      },
      {
        "field": "Plate",
        "type": "TEXT",
        "description": "Any description here",
        "allowNull": false,
        "identifier": "plate",
        "name": "plate"
      },
      {
        "field": "Manufacture Year",
        "type": "DATETIME",
        "description": "Any description here",
        "allowNull": false,
        "identifier": "manufacture_year",
        "name": "manufacture_year"
      },
      {
        "field": "Driver",
        "type": "ENTITY",
        "defaultReference": "full_name",
        "identifier": "driver_id",
        "name": "driver"
      }
    ],
    "identifier": "car"
  }
]

title: 1. Create a new Dynamic Entity
name: PostDynamicEntity

permission.name: TokenAccess
permission.title: The Client must have a token that allows it to get access on this resource.

description: Dynamic Entities to related object with monitored RFID.

examples.title: Object Example:

Body.description: Defines the name for the Dynamic Entity, must be an unique name {Required, Unique}.
Defines the type of the data field. Follows pre-defined types {Required}.
Describe the field(s) that must have unique values {Required}.
Same name of the field used to reference this entity. Only alllowed for fields with type ENTITY {Required}.
Defines a sub-entity with the same fields described here. Only alllowed for fields with type ENTITY {Required}.
A short description for the given field. Used only for field with type different of ENTITY.
Defines if wheather the field accepts null values. Used only for field with type different of ENTITY {Required}.

examples.title: Types Example
examples.content:
ENTITY: "Used to create a new data type"
RFIDCODE: "Relate the field with the RDIDData entity"
TEXT: "Create a fiel that accept only text values (strings)"
DATETIME: "Field to store a timestamp"
INTEGER: "Field to store an integer value"
GROUP: "Relate the field with the Group entity"

examples.title: Success-Response:

    "updatedAt": "2015-11-23T16:50:26.853Z",

    "packageId": 2

    "id": 1,
    "rfidCode": "5555526",
    "extraData": null,
    "rfidReadDate": "2015-11-23T16:50:22.819Z",
    "serverReceivedDate": "2015-11-23T16:50:26.850Z",
    "createdAt": "2015-11-23T16:50:26.853Z",
    "updatedAt": "2015-11-23T16:50:26.853Z",

    "packageId": 2,

      "id": 2,
      "placa": "ABC-1234",
      "chassi": "AS12345AJSD",
      "foto_platform_media": null,
      "pit": "5555526",
      "motorista_id": 1,

examples.title: Response with Embedded Records:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "id": 2,
    "placa": "ABC-1234",
    "chassi": "AS12345AJSD",
    "foto_platform_media": null,
    "pit": "5555526",
    "motorista_id": 1,
    "createdAt": "2015-12-04T19:09:03.206Z",
    "updatedAt": "2015-12-04T19:09:03.206Z",
    "deletedAt": null,

        "id": 1,
        "rfidCode": "5555526",
        "extraData": null,
        "rfidReadDate": "2015-11-23T16:50:22.819Z",
        "serverReceivedDate": "2015-11-23T16:50:26.850Z",
        "createdAt": "2015-11-23T16:50:26.853Z",
        "updatedAt": "2015-11-23T16:50:26.853Z",
        "deletedAt": null,
        "collectorId": 3,
        "packageId": 2
      }
    ]
  }

Parameter.description: (Inside "q" object) Search RFIDData linkin with this Dinamic entity. Mandatory if embeddedRecords is true.
(Inside "q" object) Search for all entities that match query defined by entityQuery parameter. Also receives sequelize queries (See here).
(Inside "q" object) For each found entity, based on entityQuery, it searcs the related rfid records to embed as an array.
(Query) Received all parameter defined by Sequelize documentations. Available here.
